lines.text: I talk to the other side Doctor Halifax. My guides can work on your behalf right now!
I wish you'd ask them to show you the quickest way home
So it doesn't matter if you bend the rules, the means justifies the end?
Look, it's nothing personal. I just can't stand shrinks who think they're detectives
And detectives who think they're God?
You haven't got a confession though. Word is he's a long way from spilling his guts.
Oh and what do you suggest, that we massage his head with a telephone directory?
Yeah well, sometimes being right isn't good enough
